data.text: @justirene2 @IngeborgRakvag @planetjedward Unfortunately you can't wash it, you need buy a whole package
@TheNathiJEDWARD @planetjedward Haven’t got it either 🤷🏼‍♀️. Been traveling, clubbing, hugging people and hanging out with friends and family while they had covid and I still haven’t got it 😅.

@TheNathiJEDWARD @IngeborgRakvag @planetjedward Can you wash this mask and wear it again or wear it once and throw it out? 
Be safe!

Been in a room with infected people 2x for HOURS

With good ventilation, a recent booster & a well fitting FFP2 mask  I got through this - no positive result myself

Just sharing my experience for all the vulnerable people reading this, gives u the best chances to stay healthy ❤️
@TheNathiJEDWARD @planetjedward Oh hey, nice mask! I wish I had those too, but all I ever bought was those surgical masks.
@IngeborgRakvag @planetjedward **hides nose so you can see the mask** https://t.co/EkYi2mCo0o
